ticket.title: RFC-0029 REQ-0008 authority-surface monotonicity and direct-GitHub non-regression

tickets.reason: Authority-surface checks depend on optimization gate and canonical evidence-governance baseline.

in_scope: Enforce production capability-surface monotonicity for optimization candidates.
Deny reintroduction of direct GitHub capability classes in production runtimes.
Require role-level capability-surface diff evidence for optimization admission.
Fail closed on missing, stale, or ambiguous authority-surface evidence.
out_of_scope: Onboarding of new sink families beyond current profile envelope.
Organization-level GitHub governance outside runtime capability surface.

steps: Add runtime capability-surface checks into projection-isolation interlock gate path.
Bind optimization admissions to capability-surface diff evidence.
Implement structured deny defects for direct GitHub capability regressions.
Add negatives for stale surface evidence and ambiguous capability mappings.

criteria: Direct GitHub capability classes remain absent in production runtime contexts.

notes.security: Authority-surface monotonicity constrains optimization-induced containment regressions.
notes.verification: Include capability-surface diff reports and direct-capability regression deny traces.
notes.general: This ticket closes REQ-0008 non-regression requirements.
